description: Gently used bats do not include a manufacturer's warranty; however, with our 30-Day 100% Satisfaction Guarantee, you can purchase a used bat with confidence. If you find yourself unsatisfied for any reason, simply return the bat for a full refund. Your happiness is our priority and rest assured all returns are free. Take advantage of high-quality bats at unbeatable prices. Our used bats may have minor cosmetic marks; however, they've been carefully inspected by our bat experts to ensure they're structurally sound. Test your bat worry-free for 30 days.
